page.title: 10Holwell - Local Suppliers
page.content: There are daily deliveries to the door of post,papers,milk and potatoes. Weekly deliveries include fresh fish, fish & chips,greengrocery,groceries, laundry and Sunday papers.Several bakers and butchers call,some 2 or 3 times a week and the ice-cream chimes are often heard. The library calls fortnightly;so do the video van and the coalman. Orders of gas and oil are delivered. The window cleaner,sweep and sewage disposal contractor come when needed. The village is well served by builders plumbers,a carpenter,a painter & decorator and a funeral director all living locally. Eggs,butter,cream,vegetables & fruit, are produced for sale by villagers. Various goods are sold at the Womens' Institute every month.
